players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."

Diana: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night, who is innocent. Alice must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
